features: 8 packs of 100 hypoallergenic and dermatologically tested wipes. Suitable for sensitive skin.
If you like Huggies Natural Care Fragrance-Free Baby Wipes, we invite you to try Mama Bear Gentle Fragrance-Free Baby Wipes
Simply formulated with chamomile, aloe, vitamin E, and triple-filtered water
Free of: fragrance, phenoxyethanol, ethyl alcohol, sodium lauryl sulfate, parabens, phthalates, dyes, sulfates, and formaldehyde donors
DO NOT FLUSH. Wipes are not flushable; put used wipes in trash. Store at room temperature. Close lid tightly to retain moisture.
Reclosable packs keep thick, quilted wipes moist, and multipacks allow you to keep them throughout the house and in travel bags
Made in USA from domestic and imported materials

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We like that they are smaller (shorter) than pampers. The pack is big so sometimes it’s harder to fit in the diaper bag but we try to use some at the changing station and then when it’s down a little we put them in the diaper bag. They tear easier than other brands so just beware but overall we really enjoy them and the price ;)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best wipes ever!
reviews.reviewText: So soft! Moisturizing! Easy to pull and to keep pulling. Works great in a wipe warmer. No scent. Strong. Favorite wipes I’ve tried with baby.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars THERES REALLY ISNT ENOUGH STARS TO GIVE THIS BRAND
reviews.reviewText: this brand of diapers and wipes are absolutely amazing from the price down to the quality. These are the most amazing products ever known. They hold a crap ton (pun intended) lol. You get so many for a small fraction of the price of the big brands and in my personal opinion with a 10 month old little girl these have been well worth the money. I have tried ever diaper and wipes and mama bear is the winner. Hands down. I’ve told so many of my friends and new mommy’s or mommies to be about them and they agreed 100 percent. Don’t waste ur money on brand name go for mama bear. The quantity you get as well as the hypoallergenic quality is perfect. I really don’t think there is another product that can even come close or comparable to how amazingly awesome mama bear products are. Absolutely amazing product!!!!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for our sensitive baby, not continuous for wipe warmer
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love these wipes. I bought 12 different brands of wipes to try out. Settled on these bc my baby has extra sensitive skin, we can’t many products. I also like that if I use her baby’s face…skin doesn’t turn red.I’ve bought twice. The first time. The wipes were continuous in my wipe warmer. I never had to reload the mouth of the wipe warmer. The second purchase..not continuous. The wipes break into about 8 sections per package. Annoying to have to reach in to reload the wipes.• don’t dry out quickly. I’ve keep a package around for travel, still hasn’t even dried out at all.•one package fills up Wipe Warmer Dispenser.•size is perfect. Not too big or small.•hold up well. I haven’t had any issues with tearing.•don’t come out in clumps of multiple wipes per pull.•awesome price.4 stars for not specifying if continuous pull through, and for not being consistent. I got both continuous and not continuous.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can't live without these!
reviews.reviewText: We used to get "boogie wipes" when my son was little, but we found those to irritate his skin and oftentimes they're scented and expensive...We found these and have used them for 6 years now! We cannot live without these! They're really great on his sensitive skin, they smell great - no fake scents, and they work really well. We live high up in the mountains where we're always either in the snow or in the heated environments so nasal issues are a common thing, these not only resolve said issues but they work quickly and I don't have to spray my sons nose or use anything invasive. He can use these on his own now and they're a household staple. They're great to keep in the car or in a bag, we all use them around here even the adults. Very highly recommended!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’m so glad I found these, the price is great and so is the quality. They’re a little thinner than the other ones but it’s actually great because you use less.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great but leftover residue
reviews.reviewText: I really liked the price but unfortunately the wipes left a residue on my son’s skin after wiping. We decided to change brands because of this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are great wipes. I mean they're wipes there's not much I can say. The only annoying thing is they sometimes are difficult to get out of the package and when you're holding the feet of a poop 2yo in one hand the last thing you want is to struggle getting wipes out of the pack. I'm being facetious, they are great wipes.
